abstract: Gene DeFilippo said he "spoke inappropriately and erroneously regarding ESPN's role in conference expansion."
snippet: Gene DeFilippo said he "spoke inappropriately and erroneously regarding ESPN's role in conference expansion."
lead_paragraph: BOSTON - Boston College's athletic director, Gene DeFilippo, apologized Tuesday for comments that appeared in The Boston Globe on Sunday that unintentionally made him the talk of college sports. DeFilippo told The Globe that ESPN influenced the move of Syracuse and Pittsburgh to the Atlantic Coast Conference and bragged about blocking Connecticut's potential move to the A.C.C. by saying, "We didn't want them in."

headline.main: Boston College A.D. Apologizes for Comments About ESPN
